summary: This is an email from an FBI Special Agent serving a federal court subpoena to T-Mobile for records, related to the Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Desk of the FBI New York Field Office. It demonstrates ongoing investigative activity in the Epstein case.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: The FBI Special Agent from the New York Field Office's Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Desk who sent the email to serve a federal court subpoena to T-Mobile for records.

events.title: Issuance of Federal Court Subpoena to T-Mobile
events.description: A federal court subpoena was issued to T-Mobile for records, as indicated by the attached PDF file name.

events.title: Service of Subpoena via Email
events.description: An FBI Special Agent emailed T-Mobile to serve the federal court subpoena for records.

keyFacts: The FBI's Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Desk in New York was actively serving subpoenas for records as of July 2021.
A federal court subpoena was issued to T-Mobile, likely seeking phone or communication records relevant to the investigation.
The document reference EFTA00155304 suggests this is part of the Epstein case document set.
